oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Einfluss von Extremtemperaturen in Getreidelagern auf die Parasitierungsleistung von Nützlingen im Vorratsschutz
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Niedermayer, Steffi
Steidle, Johannes L. M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Post harvest management and techniques
Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The application of parasitic wasps against stored pests is a common method for the protection of stored products in ecological farming. Temperature measurements in stores show that there are extreme temperatures during a year (extreme cold/hot). Field tests were made to show the influence of these extreme temperatures on the parasitation ability of beneficial insects.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Niedermayer, Steffi and Steidle, Johannes L. M. (2007) Einfluss von Extremtemperaturen in Getreidelagern auf die Parasitierungsleistung von Nützlingen im Vorratsschutz. [Influence of extreme temperatures in grain stores on the parasitation ability of beneficial insects in stored product protection.] Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
